about_the_game: This expansion brings you another new choice for First Mate: The bustling and busy moth, Elizabeth Margaret! As with the other first mates, giving her the job can lead the two of you into a dramatic relationship, and as you learn about her and what she wants out of life... well, she may be the type to avoid conflict, and to warn you she has a bit of a sharp edge! A new piece of the Mutiny!! story, new CGs and choices and visual novel excitement!
detailed_description: This expansion brings you another new choice for First Mate: The bustling and busy moth, Elizabeth Margaret! As with the other first mates, giving her the job can lead the two of you into a dramatic relationship, and as you learn about her and what she wants out of life... well, she may be the type to avoid conflict, and to warn you she has a bit of a sharp edge! A new piece of the Mutiny!! story, new CGs and choices and visual novel excitement!

short_description: Elizabeth Margaret is a curvaceous Moth-girl, and everyone's de-facto “mother” aboard the Mutiny!!. Loving to cook and clean and she always gets her way. Trusting others to do the job is another matter, and she may well get in trouble hovering over everyone's shoulder.
